summary: Improvement of Horstar\'s shop from Sneak Tools. Adds a smelter, a cooking pot, 3 chests and a satchel and rearrange few things.
descriptionHtml:
This is very simple (for now) plugin for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19447/]Sneak Tools[/url] by [url=http://http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2141257/]Borgut1337[/url].

It aims to improve Horstar\'s shop so you can make it your main place for storing and crafting items since it\'s easy to get by using the spell.

So far a smelter, a cooking pot, 3 chests and a satchel are added.
Teleport point was moved closer to main hall.
Archery target and mannequin were deleted.
Few items were moved. 

Installation:
1. Make sure you have [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19447/]Sneak Tools[/url] installed
2. Install this mod using any manager (NMM, MO) or manualy by extracting the file into Skyrim/Data folder
3. SneakTools - ShopPlus.esp have to be loaded after SneakTools.esp

All credits go to [url=http://http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2141257/]Borgut1337[/url] and Bethesda.

Enjoy
author: Drusek
